message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. For this round, I am offering it to you for $140.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, my budget for this is closer to $100. Would you be willing to come down on the price?
I understand your position, Bob. Let me see what I can do. In this round, I am willing to offer the product for $125.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, $120 is the highest I can go.  If you're able to meet that, I'm ready to make the deal.
